flawed_nl_solution:
Thomas originally orders chairs for 3 dozen guests, 12 x 3 = 36 guests
Thomas finds out that 1/3 of the guests want to bring a guest of their own, 1/3 of 36 = <<1/3*36=108/1>>108/1
The 108/1 guests bring a guest of their own each, 36 guests + 108/1 guests = <<36+108/1=144>>144
Thomas finds out that 20 of the guests can't make it, 144 guests - 5 guests = 139
Thomas wants to order an extra 12 chairs, 139 + 12 = <<139+12=151>>151
#### 151

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 108/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
